import React from "react"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; import validation from "./Validation"; function FormExample() { const { handleSubmit, handleChange, values, errors } = useFormik({ initialValues: { email: "email@email.com", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", gender: "noGender", hobies: [], country: "Turkey", }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log({ status: "Form submitted", values: values, date: new Date(), }); }, validationSchema: validation, }); return (
